item.Title: Let It Snow
item.Description: On Christmas Eve in Laurel, Illinois, Julie Reyes runs into rising pop star Stuart Bale on a train. He mistakes her for a fan when she tries to return his phone to him, to which she takes offense, despite his apologies.

item.Title: Noelle
item.Description: imagines a North Pole where the role of Santa Claus is passed down to different generations of men in the Kringle family, meaning that the neurotic Nick (Bill Hader) is next in line, even though he doesn't want the responsibility.

item.Title: Happiest Season
item.Description: A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas by revealing a nasty secret. Meeting your girlfriend's family for the first time can be tough.

item.Title: Christmas Chronicles
item.Description: The plot follows an unorthodox Santa Claus who must fight off an assassin sent by a vengeful naughty kid.
